code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Logo from"../assests/logo.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Header=()=>{const[theme,setTheme]=useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("theme"))||"medium");useEffect(()=>{localStorage.setItem("theme",JSON.stringify(theme));document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class");document.documentElement.classList.add(theme);},[theme]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Logo,alt:"Taskmate Logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Save Task"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"themeSelector",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>setTheme("light"),className:theme==="light"?"light activeTheme":"light"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>setTheme("medium"),className:theme==="medium"?"medium activeTheme":"medium"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>setTheme("dark"),className:theme==="dark"?"dark activeTheme":"dark"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>setTheme("gOne"),className:theme==="gOne"?"gOne activeTheme":"gOne"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>setTheme("gTwo"),className:theme==="gTwo"?"gTwo activeTheme":"gTwo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>setTheme("gThree"),className:theme==="gThree"?"gThree activeTheme":"gThree"})]})]});};
